description.en:
TRGO is a token designed on TRON blockchain , a trc 20 token, used for shopping on various platforms as well as a medium of exchange worldwide. TRGO is best known for its limited supply as it has only a total supply of 100000000 TRGO only. Current circulating supply is 10040000 as for now and can only mint new tokens with a speed of 10000 tokens per day only, this will take approximately 25 years to mint all tokens if minted daily.
This feature will prevent the pump and dump of the token as most tokens do.
